name: places/ChIJ3ah3Os9ZwokRJc1SdXLZTkE
formattedAddress: 20 Hudson Yards, 500 W 33rd St 3rd Fl, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 20 Hudson Yards, 500 W 33rd St 3rd Fl, New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text: Very nice salon ambiance: very clean,  friendly and accommodating stuff at reception and both women I worked with were super nice. Great choice of nail polish. The manicure was pretty good for US standards. The massage was very nicely performed as well. The only thing I would recommend to improve is the pedicure area: it's uncomfortable to have a water basin that can be tipped over: doesn't let you relax. Also, I can't believe the low position of the chair is comfortable for staff: they need to get some seating with back support. Would recommend overall. I'd say a great quality/price ratio.

originalText.text:
So awesome! The thing that drew me here was the offer to have meditation while you’re getting your nails done. Then I found out that all of the nail polish is non-toxic, which is pretty cool. I also only had a little bit of time on my hands and really needed to at least have some color on. So I just got a very simple polish change and they were super nice about it. it comes with a very mini hand massage and a hot towel. The woman that did my nails was fantastic! She was super mindful that I was doing the meditation. And my nails look fantastic! I’ll definitely be coming only here from now on.

For color, I got a cute little wine looking color.

Quick update: if you are wondering if the polish lasts… it DOES! I still have this same color from the time I went in which is about 9 days ago now. My nails are growing so obviously I’ll beed a touchup soon but the polish is fantastic with a strong hold.

originalText.text: First time at this salon - read the great reviews and went in for a mani. Love that you can book online - it makes life SO MUCH EASIER. Mary did a fantastic job (and she had her work cut out for her - it'd been a while). Great attention to detail and my nails look great! The salon itself is clean and serene. Felt welcomed when I arrived. I was offered water or tea when I sat down - a nice touch. This spot will be a go-to for me!

originalText.text:
I was extremely excited to try out this Vegan Nail salon, but I must say I was disappointed with the outcome.
I got a late evening Gel Manicure last Friday 4.14.23 and since this past l weekend the nail polish has been chipping. For the prices they charge the quality for a Gel Manicure is not worth it in my opinion.
The service was pleasant and the Manager was very friendly, but I don’t think I would go back at this time.

originalText.text: I’ll start off by saying that the environment was beautiful and the workers were kind. However, for an $85 Gel manicure I’m extremely unsatisfied and would never recommend anyone to come here. My manicure looks like a child did it for me, in fact they would’ve done a better job. On top of them not having the color I selected, when doing the manicure I was cut on my finger. Nice & kind workers with POOR service.
